name: Thomas B. COTTON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Cotton v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Thomas B. COTTON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of January, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

61 A.3d 188
Thomas B. COTTON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
